title: Forecasted Delta T
text:
Below are maps of forecast maximum Delta T for North Dakota from today through the next six days. They are derived from National Weather Service hourly forecasts and are not an official NWS forecast product.
Visit the National Weather Service to access the local forecast for your area. Check NDAWN.org, NDAWN.info, or the NDAWN Inversion app for current local weather conditions.

Today



Tomorrow

Saturday, May 24, 2025



Sunday, May 25, 2025



Monday, May 26, 2025

title: Historical Delta T
text:
Below are two-panel maps showing maximum Delta T and wind speed at the time of maximum Delta T for North Dakota over the past seven days. They are derived from North Dakota Agricultural Weather Network hourly data, which is available at NDAWN.org.
Use the navigation menu to access historical maps dating back to May 1.

Yesterday
